verses.text: \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*: Gershon, \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.
\w The|strong="H8034"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Uzziel.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*: Aaron, Moses, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Miriam. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.

Eleazar \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phinehas, Phinehas \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abishua,

Abishua \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bukki, Bukki \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Uzzi,

Uzzi \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zerahiah, Zerahiah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Meraioth,

Meraioth \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah, Amariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub,

Ahitub \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zadok, Zadok \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimaaz,

Ahimaaz \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah, Azariah \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Johanan,

Johanan \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* served \w as|strong="H1121"\w* priest \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* temple \w that|strong="H1121"\w* Solomon built \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem,

Azariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah, Amariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub,

Ahitub \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zadok, Zadok \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shallum,

Shallum \w was|strong="H8050"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Hilkiah, Hilkiah \w was|strong="H8050"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah,

Azariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Seraiah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Seraiah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehozadak.

Jehozadak \w went|strong="H1121"\w* into captivity \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* sent Judah \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem into exile \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nebuchadnezzar.
\w The|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Levi: Gershom, Kohath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Merari.

\w These|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* names \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Gershom: Libni \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Shimei.
\w The|strong="H5975"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Uzziel.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Merari: Mahli \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Mushi. These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* clans \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H1121"\w* listed according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* their fathers:

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Gershom: Libni \w his|strong="H6689"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jahath \w his|strong="H6689"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zimmah \w his|strong="H6689"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Joah \w his|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Iddo \w his|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zerah \w his|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jeatherai \w his|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath: Amminadab \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Assir \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Elkanah \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Ebiasaph \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Assir \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Tahath \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uriel \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uzziah \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Shaul \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.
\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah: Amasai, Ahimoth,
Elkanah \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zophai \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Nahath \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Eliab \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jeroham \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Samuel: Joel \w his|strong="H3189"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abijah \w his|strong="H3189"\w* second \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*: Mahli, Libni \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Shimei \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uzzah \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Shimea \w his|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Haggiah \w his|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Asaiah \w his|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* David put \w in|strong="H1121"\w* charge \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* music \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* after \w the|strong="H1121"\w* ark rested there.

They ministered \w with|strong="H1121"\w* song before \w the|strong="H1121"\w* tabernacle, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Meeting, until Solomon built \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* they performed \w their|strong="H4847"\w* duties according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* regulations given \w them|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* served, together \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* sons. \w From|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Kohathites: Heman \w the|strong="H3605"\w* singer, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Joel, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Samuel,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jeroham, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliel, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Toah,

\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zuph, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mahath, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amasai,

\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joel, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zephaniah,

\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Tahath, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assir, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ebiasaph, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Korah,

\w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Izhar, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel.

Hemanâ€™s kinsman \w was|strong="H1961"\w* Asaph, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* right hand: Asaph \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Berechiah, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shimea,
\w the|strong="H5414"\w* son \w of|strong="H5439"\w* Michael, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* son \w of|strong="H5439"\w* Baaseiah, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* son \w of|strong="H5439"\w* Malchijah,

\w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ethni, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zerah, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Adaiah,

\w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ethan, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zimmah, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shimei,
the son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Jahath, the son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Gershom, the son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Levi.

On the left \w were|strong="H1053"\w* their kinsmen, the sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Merari: Ethan the son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Kishi, the son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Abdi, the son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Malluch,
\w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Hashabiah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Amaziah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Hilkiah,

\w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amzi, \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bani, \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shemer,

\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mahli, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mushi, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Merari, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi.

\w Their|strong="H8147"\w* \w fellow|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* assigned \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H4940"\w* kind \w of|strong="H1121"\w* service \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* tabernacle, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w But|strong="H3881"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w work|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Most Holy \w Place|strong="H5414"\w*. \w They|strong="H3478"\w* \w presented|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* burnt offering \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* incense \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* atonement \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* commanded.

\w These|strong="H7121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: Eleazar \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Phinehas \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Abishua \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Bukki \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uzzi \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zerahiah \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Meraioth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son, Amariah \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son, Ahitub \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son,
Zadok his son, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Ahimaaz his son.
Now these were the territories assigned to the descendants \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Aaron from the Kohathite clan for their settlements, because the first lot fell to them:

They \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given Hebron \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w land|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah \w and|strong="H1121"\w* its surrounding \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

But \w the|strong="H2677"\w* fields \w and|strong="H1121"\w* villages around \w the|strong="H2677"\w* city \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Caleb \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jephunneh.
So \w the|strong="H3485"\w* descendants \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Aaron \w were|strong="H4294"\w* given Hebron (\w a|strong="H3068"\w* city \w of|strong="H4294"\w* refuge), Libnah, Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Hilen, Debir,
Ashan, Juttah, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Beth-shemesh, together \w with|strong="H4294"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* from the tribe \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Benjamin they were given Gibeon, Geba, Alemeth, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Anathoth, together with their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*. So they had thirteen cities \w in|strong="H4054"\w* all among their families.

\w To|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H4294"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H4294"\w* Kohathites, ten cities \w were|strong="H4294"\w* allotted \w from|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H4294"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Manasseh.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* Gershomites, according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* clans, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* allotted thirteen cities \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Bashan.

\w The|strong="H5676"\w* Merarites, according \w to|strong="H3383"\w* their clans, \w were|strong="H3383"\w* allotted twelve cities \w from|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, Gad, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Zebulun.
So the Israelites gave \w to|strong="H6932"\w* the Levites these cities \w and|strong="H4054"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

They assigned by lot \w the|strong="H1410"\w* cities named above \w from|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H1410"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Judah, Simeon, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Benjamin.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* some \w of|strong="H3270"\w* \w the|strong="H3270"\w* clans \w of|strong="H3270"\w* \w the|strong="H3270"\w* Kohathites were given cities from \w the|strong="H3270"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H3270"\w* Ephraim for their territory:
They were given Shechem (\w a|strong="H3068"\w* city of refuge) with its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim, and Gezer,
Jokmeam, Beth-horon,
Aijalon, and Gath-rimmon, together with their pasturelands.
And from the half-tribe of Manasseh the rest of the clans of the Kohathites were given Aner and Bileam, together with their pasturelands.
The Gershomites received the following: From the clan of the half-tribe of Manasseh they were given Golan in Bashan and also Ashtaroth, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Issachar they were given Kedesh, Daberath,
Ramoth, and Anem, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Asher they were given Mashal, Abdon,
Hukok, and Rehob, together with their pasturelands.
And from the tribe of Naphtali they were given Kedesh in Galilee, Hammon, and Kiriathaim, together with their pasturelands.
The Merarites (the rest of the Levites) received the following: From the tribe of Zebulun they were given Rimmono and Tabor, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Reuben east of the Jordan opposite Jericho they were given Bezer in the wilderness, Jahzah,
Kedemoth, and Mephaath, together with their pasturelands.
And from the tribe of Gad they were given Ramoth in Gilead, Mahanaim,
Heshbon, and Jazer, together with their pasturelands.
